data.title: Apple TV (AU)
data.meta_description: Manhunt is a gripping mini-series based on the true story of a murder investigation that kept the people of Britain on the edge their seats and defineâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

The First Day

Detective Chief Inspector Colin Sutton of the Metropolitan police takes on the role of senior investigating officer, when French student Amelie Delegrange's body is discovered on Twickenham Green in 2004.

45 min Â· 3 Jan 2023 M

EPISODE 2

The Van

The team tries to identify a white van seen close to the crime scene of an attack, a task that proves to be difficult with 25,000 possible vans to check.

45 min Â· 3 Jan 2023 M

EPISODE 3

The Suspect

Bellfield's home is raided by DCI Sutton's relentless team as they hope to finally make an arrest, but they still can't find the suspects.

45 min Â· 10 Jan 2023 M

EPISODE 2

The Night Stalker: Part 2

Colin presents his review findings to DCS Hamish Campbell and suggests a strategy called Minstead Lite, but Hamish wants Colin to stay on to see this new approach through.

43 min Â· 18 Jan 2023 M
